gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 115, Jazz 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hornets defeated the Jazz, 115-107. Miles Bridges recorded 26 points, 14 rebounds, and four assists for the Hornets, with Grant Williams adding 24 points and two assists in the victory. Lauri Markkanen tallied 21 points, nine rebounds, and six assists for the Jazz in the losing effort. The Hornets have won four in a row and improve to 14-41, while the Jazz fall to 26-31.
